author: hwright
msg: Don't worry about introducing propcaching when upgrading working copies.
We've already nuked propcaching on trunk, so this is a pointless step.

author: gstein
msg: Record what formats were used in each release of Subversion.

author: hwright

Note: This increases the number of test failures, but gets us conceptually

author: hwright
msg: Remove conditional compilation code designed to prevent inadvertent
working copy format upgrades.  Since 1.7 will require an explicit
cleanup to upgrade, this code is not needed.
(maybe_upgrade_format): Remove version used to block silent upgrades.
